attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/sd | grep -v sda | xargs sudo  pvcreate

sudo vgcreate mongodata /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd 
sudo vgcreate mongojournal /dev/sde 
sudo vgcreate mongolog /dev/sdf

sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n mongodata mongodata
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongojournal mongojournal 
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongolog mongolog

sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

echo "/dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata ${DATA_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noatime,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal ${JOURNAL_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog ${LOG_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

sudo blockdev --setra 32 /dev/dm-2
sudo blockdev --getra /dev/dm-2

sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=1
echo 'vm.swappiness=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf


sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#  path: /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log#  path: ${LOG_PATH}/mongod.log#" /etc/mongod.conf
    

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 5

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.name: action_uninstall

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi

#Mongo data
sudo pvcreate /dev/xvdb /dev/xvdc /dev/xvdd /dev/xvde /dev/xvdf 

sudo vgcreate mongodata /dev/xvdb /dev/xvdc /dev/xvdd  
sudo vgcreate mongojournal /dev/xvde 
sudo vgcreate mongolog /dev/xvdf

sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n mongodata mongodata
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongojournal mongojournal 
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongolog mongolog

sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog

sudo mount -a

sudo blockdev --getra /dev/dm-2

sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=1
echo 'vm.swappiness=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf


sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#  path: /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log#  path: ${LOG_PATH}/mongod.log#" /etc/mongod.conf

	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag

sleep 5

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

VERSION="@@{MONGO_VERSION}@@"
DATA_PATH="@@{DATA_PATH}@@"
JOURNAL_PATH="@@{JOURNAL_PATH}@@"
LOG_PATH="@@{LOG_PATH}@@"

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/sd | grep -v sda | xargs sudo  pvcreate

sudo vgcreate mongodata /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd 
sudo vgcreate mongojournal /dev/sde 
sudo vgcreate mongolog /dev/sdf

sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n mongodata mongodata
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongojournal mongojournal 
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongolog mongolog

sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

echo "/dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata ${DATA_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noatime,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal ${JOURNAL_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog ${LOG_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

sudo blockdev --setra 32 /dev/dm-2
sudo blockdev --getra /dev/dm-2

sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=1
echo 'vm.swappiness=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf


sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#  path: /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log#  path: ${LOG_PATH}/mongod.log#" /etc/mongod.conf
    

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 5

sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo yum install -y --quiet mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

sudo yum install -y --quiet lvm2 numactl lsscsi
sudo lsscsi | awk '{print $NF}' | grep /dev/sd | grep -v sda | xargs sudo  pvcreate

sudo vgcreate mongodata /dev/sdb /dev/sdc /dev/sdd 
sudo vgcreate mongojournal /dev/sde 
sudo vgcreate mongolog /dev/sdf

sudo lvcreate -i 3 -l 100%VG -n mongodata mongodata
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongojournal mongojournal 
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n mongolog mongolog

sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal
sudo mkfs.xfs -K /dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog

sudo mkdir -p ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

echo "/dev/mapper/mongodata-mongodata ${DATA_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noatime,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongojournal-mongojournal ${JOURNAL_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0
/dev/mapper/mongolog-mongolog ${LOG_PATH} xfs defaults,auto,noexec 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo ln -s ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${DATA_PATH}/journal
sudo chown -R mongod:mongod ${DATA_PATH} ${JOURNAL_PATH} ${LOG_PATH}

sudo blockdev --setra 32 /dev/dm-2
sudo blockdev --getra /dev/dm-2

sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=1
echo 'vm.swappiness=1' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf


sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DATA_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#  path: /var/log/mongodb/mongod.log#  path: ${LOG_PATH}/mongod.log#" /etc/mongod.conf
    

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 5
